bill_title: Honoring and commending Janice Gilbert on being named Tea Area School District Teacher of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending Janice Gilbert on being named Tea Area School District Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Janice Gilbert has been working as a vocal music instructor for the past six years for students in grades 7 through 12; and WHEREAS, Janice went above and beyond for her students to ensure that they got the most out of their experiences in her classroom and ensured each got a quality education while in her classes; and WHEREAS, Janice works diligently to connect with the students in the classroom in a way that is both educational and enjoyable: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and commends Janice Gilbert on being named Tea Area School District Teacher of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending Janice Gilbert on being named Tea Area School District Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Janice Gilbert has been working as a vocal music instructor for the past six years for students in grades 7 through 12; and WHEREAS, Janice went above and beyond for her students to ensure that they got the most out of their experiences in her classroom and ensured each got a quality education while in her classes; and WHEREAS, Janice works diligently to connect with the students in the classroom in a way that is both educational and enjoyable: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and commends Janice Gilbert on being named Tea Area School District Teacher of the Year.
